wikipedia_page.main: Francis Pepper (July 1875 – 1914) was an English footballer. His regular position was at half back. He was born in Wortley, West Riding of Yorkshire (now in South Yorkshire). He played for Sheffield United, Newton Heath LYR, Barnsley, Doncaster Rovers and South Kirkby.He died in Rotherham in 1914, at the age of 38.
